column4: Automatically logs in a user after registration or confirmation (must be approved and confirmed).
Logs activity when a user logs in.
Logs activity when a user logs out.
Logs activity when a new user registers.
Logs activity for profile updates.
Logs activity for avatar updates.
Logs activity for canvas updates.
Logs activity for liking a page.
Logs activity for comments on pages.
Logs activity when a new connection is added and accepted.
Logs notification when a new connection is requested and pending. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_request_conn.
Logs notification when a new connection is accepted. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_accepted_conn.
Logs notification when a new connection is rejected. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_rejected_conn.
Deletes activity and notifications for removed connections.
Logs notifications for activity posts on a users profile stream. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_post.
Logs notifications for global activity posts on any activity stream. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_global_post.
Logs activity for activity comments.
Bumps activity to the top when a comment is made.
Logs notifications for activity comments. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_comment.
Logs notifications for activity comments to all users (except activity owner) who commented. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_comment_chain.
Logs notifications for activity comment replies. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_comment_reply.

column3: CB Activity - Comment Reply Chain Notification
column4: Logs notifications for activity comment replies to all users (except comment owner) who commented. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_comment_reply_chain.
Logs activity for comment tags.
Logs notifications for comment tags. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_comment_tag.
Logs activity for comment likes.
Logs notifications for comment likes. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_comment_like.
Logs activity for activity tags.
Logs notifications for activity tags. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_tag.
Logs activity for activity likes.
Logs notifications for activity likes. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_like.
Displays privacy selector for new activity.
Displays privacy selector for activity edit.
Saves activity privacy rules.
Checks privacy rules on activity.
Logs activity for uploaded and linked media to profiles.
Deletes activity, notifications, comments, tags and likes for deleted media.
Adds likes to gallery media.
Adds commenting to gallery media.
Logs notifications to users connections for uploaded and linked media. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_gallery_conn.
Logs notifications for gallery media comments. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_gallery_comment.
Logs notifications for gallery media tags. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_gallery_tag.
Logs notifications for gallery media likes. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_gallery_like.
Displays privacy selector for gallery album and media edit.
Saves gallery privacy rules.
Checks privacy rules on gallery.
Logs activity for newly created article entries.
Logs activity for comments on articles.
Logs notifications for article comments. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_article_comment.
Logs notifications for article likes. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_article_like.
Deletes activity, notifications, comments and likes for deleted article entries.

Logs notification when a user receives a private message. Note this only applies to Internal model and does not function with UddeIM and only for user to user private messages. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_pm.
Deletes notifications for deleted private messages.
Logs activity for newly created blog entries.
Logs notifications to users connections for newly created blog entries. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_blog_conn.
Deletes activity, notifications, comments and likes for deleted blog entries.
Logs activity for newly created discussions.
Logs activity for discussion replies.
Deletes activity for deleted discussions.
Logs activity for newly created groups.

column3: CB GroupJive - Group Create Connections Notification
column4: Logs notifications to users connections for newly created groups. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_group_create_conn.
Deletes activity, notifications, follows, tags and likes for deleted groups.
Logs activity when joining a group.
Logs notifications when joining a group. This will override the GJ notification method.

column3: CB GroupJive - Group Join Connections Notification
column4: Logs notifications to users connections when joining a group. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_group_join_conn.
Deletes group activity on group leave.
Logs notifications when leaving a group. This will override the GJ notification method.
Logs notifications when invited to a group. This will override the GJ notification method.
Logs notifications when sending group messages. This will override the GJ notification method.
Adds activity stream to groups.
Displays a notification parameter for toggling stream notifications on/off on a per group basis.
Logs notifications to all active group users when a new post is made on the groups stream. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_group_stream.
Adds follow button to groups. Note only applies to Open groups.
Adds like button to groups.
Adds media gallery to groups.
Logs activity for uploaded and linked media in groups.
Displays a notification parameter for toggling gallery notifications on/off on a per group basis.
Logs notifications to all active group users when media is uploaded or linked on a groups gallery. Can be toggled with a checkbox field named cb_notif_group_gallery.
Attempts to log all other notifications instead of sending private messages or emails.
Logs activity for newly created group wall posts.
Logs comments for newly created group wall post replies.
Logs notifications for group wall posts. This will override the GJ notification method.
Deletes activity, notifications and comments for deleted group wall posts.
Adds like button to group photos.
Logs activity for newly uploaded group photos.
Logs notifications for group photos. This will override the GJ notification method.
Deletes activity, notifications and likes for deleted group photos.
Logs activity for newly uploaded group files.
Logs notifications for group files. This will override the GJ notification method.
Deletes activity, notifications and likes for deleted group files.
Adds like button to group videos.
Logs activity for newly uploaded group videos.
Logs notifications for group videos. This will override the GJ notification method.
Deletes activity, notifications and likes for deleted group videos.
Adds like button to group events.
Logs activity for newly scheduled events.
Logs notifications for group events. This will override the GJ notification method.
Deletes activity, notifications and likes for deleted group events.
Email di notifica agli amministratori per la notifica di inserimento di una domanda
column13:
{"email":[{"to":"administrator@lifeintravel.it, francesco@lifeintravel.it, davide.b@lifeintravel.it","subject":"Nuova domanda BEER impostata","body":"

Ciao,

l'abbonato [username] ha inserito la sua domanda B.E.E.R.. Questa è la sua domanda:

[cb_amaquestion]

Mi raccomando rispondi prontamente! Per rispondere accedi al suo profilo qui:

Accedi al profilo dell'utente

ed inserisci la tua risposta nel campo La risposta di Life in Travel della scheda Il tuo mondo LiT

Buon lavoro,

Life in Travel

column4: Email di notifica agli utenti per l'inserimento di una risposta a BEER
column13:
{"email":[{"to":"[email]","subject":"Ecco la risposta alla tua domanda - BEER","body":"

Ciao [username],

è appena stata inserita una risposta alla tua domanda nella sezione B.E.E.R. di Life in Travel:

[cb_answer]

Troverai la risposta anche nella scheda Il tuo mondo LiT del tuo profilo su Life in Travel.

Se hai altre domande non esitare a contattarci rispondendo a questa mail o tramite il sistema di messaggistica interna di Life in Travel.

Buone pedalate,

Leo, Vero, Fra e Bendo

Life in Travel
